actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The bear makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d4 + 3) Slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.
